# Import-MCDWinPEXaml

Source: `source/Private/WinPE/UI/Import-MCDWinPEXaml.ps1`

## Synopsis

Loads a WinPE WPF window from a XAML file.

## Description

Loads required WPF assemblies and parses the provided XAML file using
Windows.Markup.XamlReader. Returns the resulting Window instance.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Pipeline | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| XamlPath | String | Yes | No | Full path to the XAML file to load as a WPF window.   |

## Examples

### Example 1

```powershell
$window = Import-MCDWinPEXaml -XamlPath 'X:\\MCD\\Xaml\\WinPE\\MainWindow.xaml'

Loads the main WinPE window XAML and returns the Window object.
```
